name: Chandra Krintz
content: Chandra Krintz, UCSB Professor Chandra Krintz Professor, Associate Dean of Graduate Division UCSB Computer Science HH 2009/2101 ckrintz@ucsb.edu Pubs Lab Students CV Bio News Chandra co-directs the Lab for Research on Adaptive Computing Environments (RACELab) and research efforts on xGFabric, SmartFarm, Where's the Bear (WTB), and Next-Gen Cloud/Edge IoT Systems, with Prof. Rich Wolski. Research Interests/Areas: Digital and precision agriculture; AI systems for the Internet of Things (IoT); programming systems; cloud computing and services; distributed edge computing; energy efficient computing. A complete publication list can be found here.
